item.title: Fri 10 Mar 2023: Tampopo (タンポポ)
item.description: DETAILS: Tampopo (タンポポ) 10 March 2023 8.30 PM UK time / 9.30 PM CET/WAT Duration: approx. 139 mins Watch party: Provo.lol on Twitch Episode from Wakakozake (ワカコ酒) (2015), created by Chie Shinkyu, 30 mins Tampopo (タンポポ) (1985), directed by Jūzō Itami, 115 mins A collection of clips of Paul Hollywood eating things, 8 mins b.y.o.b. + b.y.o 🍜
